MESSAGE.JP: が聞こえる。
？@「…今日はくもりのちあめー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `?@❝...Today, it's going to be cloudy, later it'll be rainy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `?@❝...Today, it's going to be cloudy, later it'll be rainy...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: It was singing a monotonous melody.

MESSAGE.JP: ？@「ねこねこ、うたうー」
れどとても楽しそうに。
？@「のきしたはくらい」
？@「輪のしたはこわい」
？@「くさばはつめたい」
？@「ねこねこ、うたうー」
？@「明日はあめのちはれー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `?@❝Tomorrow, it's going to rain, and later it'll clear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `?@❝Tomorrow, it's going to rain, and later it'll clear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん…」
は机の上にうつ伏せになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself lying face-down on my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself lying face-down on my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: を起こすと、開け放たれた窓と机に腰掛けた鈴が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I raised my head, I found Rin sitting on a desk by the open window.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I raised my head, I found Rin sitting on a desk by the open window.

MESSAGE.JP: は鼻歌をうたいながら、窓の外を眺めている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking out, humming that silly song.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking out, humming that silly song.

MESSAGE.JP: の横顔があんまりに…
あんまりに儚げで消えてしまいそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...so transient I felt like she might fade away at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...so transient I felt like she might fade away at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: の存在を確認したくて、僕は呼ぶ。

MESSAGE.Translation: I called her name to verify her existence.

MESSAGE.JP: は歌うのを止めて僕を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped singing and turned her eyes to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped singing and turned her eyes to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「起きた？」
理樹@「うん…起きた…」
を起こして教室を見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat up and looked around the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat up and looked around the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one else in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one else in here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰もいない…」
鈴@「放課後だから当然だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Of course not. It's after school now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Of course not. It's after school now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それも、そっか」
ぁ、とあくびをする。
理樹@「何、鈴？」
はぴょん、と机から下りる。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped down to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped down to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: い、と顔を近づけてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She then brought her face very close to mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then brought her face very close to mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なに？」
、と人差し指を立てる。
るくる、と鈴が人差し指を回す。
MESSAGE.EN: She began tracing circles in the air with the finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began tracing circles in the air with the finger.

MESSAGE.JP: られて指先を追う。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes followed its hypnotic movement.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes followed its hypnotic movement.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん」
に指先が当てられた。
鈴@「よだれ」
理樹@「え、あ、よだれたれてる？」
鈴@「垂れてる。垂れまくり」
っ、と指先で払う鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She brushed my drool off with her finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brushed my drool off with her finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うあ…」
だれ垂らして寝こけてたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god, I was drooling in my sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god, I was drooling in my sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと間抜けだ。
理樹@「どしたの鈴？」
は指先を見たまま困った風に唸った。
MESSAGE.EN: She was groaning, staring at the tip of her finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was groaning, staring at the tip of her finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「えいっ」
くっと指先を自分の口の中に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the finger in her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the finger in her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…もごもご…」
理樹@「な、何してるのさ」
鈴@「みんなが男のつばはなんか違うとか言ってたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Everyone told me that men's drool is different from women's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Everyone told me that men's drool is different from women's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…どこが違う？」
理樹@「い、いや、そんなこと僕に訊かれても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, well, how should I know that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, well, how should I know that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「というか、鈴、いきなりそんなことしないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never mind that. Rin, you shouldn't do that all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never mind that. Rin, you shouldn't do that all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt embarrassed for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt embarrassed for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だって」
は頬をふくらませた。
鈴@「あたしだけ話に入れなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was left out when they were talking about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was left out when they were talking about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「葉留佳に慰められた…」
理樹@「そ、それは想像するとかなり…」
白そうな光景だな…。
鈴@「でも、もう語れるっ！」
は腕組みをして力強く頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She folded her arms and gave a triumphant nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She folded her arms and gave a triumphant nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一緒だ！」
理樹@「そ、そう…それはいい勉強になったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-oh yeah? ...It's nice to learn something new...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-oh yeah? ...It's nice to learn something new...❞

MESSAGE.JP: て、僕も何を言ってるんだ…。
だ寝ぼけてるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I wasn't completely awake yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I wasn't completely awake yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んーっ」
は背伸びをした。
理樹@「どうしたの、鈴？」
は机に手をつくと、じっと僕を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She planted her hands on my desk and stared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She planted her hands on my desk and stared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「実は」
理樹@「うん？」
鈴@「不意打ちしようか迷ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was wondering if I should do a surprise attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was wondering if I should do a surprise attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこを不意打ち…」
ょん、と軽い感触。
MESSAGE.EN: The touch was light as a feather.
MESSAGE.Translation: The touch was light as a feather.

MESSAGE.JP: かな教室の空気に、ちりん、と鈴の音が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The chime of her bell echoed through the silent classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chime of her bell echoed through the silent classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: は駆け足で通り過ぎて行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Summer had gone by so fast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Summer had gone by so fast.

MESSAGE.JP: つの間にか日の光がずいぶん優しくなっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I knew it, the sunlight had started to wane.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I knew it, the sunlight had started to wane.

MESSAGE.JP: れとともに風にひんやりとしたものを感じる季節になっていた。

MESSAGE.Translation: The winds had also begun to carry a chilly edge lately.

MESSAGE.JP: しぶりに冬服に袖を通してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: Today was the first day I was wearing my winter uniform after a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today was the first day I was wearing my winter uniform after a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくは夏服だった鈴も、もう冬服だ。
鈴@「…こうしてるとき頭の中、どーなってる？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...What goes on inside your head while we do this?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She slowly withdrew her lips from mine and curiously asked me.

鈴@「例えば？」
理樹@「そうだね、例えば…」
理樹@「例えば、鈴のしてる髪飾りのこととか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For example, about that hair accessory you're wearing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For example, about that hair accessory you're wearing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あるいは鈴の髪の毛のこととか」
理樹@「もしくは鈴の唇の感触とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or about the feel of your lips.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or about the feel of your lips.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしのことばっかだな」
理樹@「うん、そうだね…というか、別のこと考えて欲しいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it is... Or would you prefer I think about something else?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it is... Or would you prefer I think about something else?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…別のこと？」
鈴@「あたし以外のこと？」
理樹@「うん」
鈴@「うー…」
んぶんっ。
は首を大きく振った。
鈴@「なんかやだな」
理樹@「だろうね」
ち上がって背伸びをする。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and stretched my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and stretched my back.

MESSAGE.JP: が痺れてるところをほぐす。
MESSAGE.EN: My arms had fallen asleep, so I massaged them.
MESSAGE.Translation: My arms had fallen asleep, so I massaged them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういう鈴は？」
鈴@「…何も考えてない」
理樹@「え、そうなんだ」
鈴@「頭の中真っ白だ」
理樹@「そいうもんなんだ…」
鈴@「そゆうもんだ」
がなんだか偉そうに頷く。

MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded with an air of superiority.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I think I saw this kind of scene in one of Kyousuke's manga.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...About a boy and girl who had known each other ever since they were little.❞

鈴@「ためになった。べんきょーになったかんじだ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was worth reading. I think I learned a lot from it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介が聞いたら泣いて喜びそうだね」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If Kyousuke were to hear that, he would probably be moved to tears.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…泣いてなんかなかったぞ」
鈴@「むしろ大笑い」
鈴@「何で笑うんだ、あの馬鹿兄貴」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why does that stupid brother laugh at me all the time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どーせあたしは何にも行動できないとかおもってるんだろう」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He must think I can do nothing by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こどもあつかいなんだから」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He always treats me like a child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れる鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She puffed out her cheeks in indignation.
MESSAGE.Translation: She puffed out her cheeks in indignation.

MESSAGE.JP: ういう仕草が子供っぽいんだけどな。
MESSAGE.EN: That kind of reaction is precisely one of those that make you look like a child.
MESSAGE.Translation: That kind of reaction is precisely one of those that make you look like a child.

MESSAGE.JP: も、そこが可愛いから黙っていることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I guess I'd better not tell her, because she looks cute when she does that.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I guess I'd better not tell her, because she looks cute when she does that.

MESSAGE.JP: ったらキックが飛んできそうだし。
MESSAGE.EN: And because she would definitely kick me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And because she would definitely kick me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なので」
鈴@「あたしからしてみた」
は誇らしそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked really proud of herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked really proud of herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どーだっ」
鈴@「意外性たっぷりでかんぺきだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I did something that nobody would ever expect me to do!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I did something that nobody would ever expect me to do!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、鈴、がんばったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, Rin, you did a great job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, Rin, you did a great job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「がんばった」
りん。
理樹@「がんばった鈴にご褒美を献上したい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like to give you a reward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like to give you a reward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うむ。献上するがいい」
はそっと鈴の頬に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I tenderly put my hand on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tenderly put my hand on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: でなで。
は猫みたいに喉を鳴らした。
MESSAGE.EN: She purred almost like a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She purred almost like a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なでなでだけ？」

鈴@「足りない」
は素直に感情をぶつけてくる。

理樹@「そっか」
はくすくす笑う。
を引き寄せた。
を軽く撫でる。
鈴@「やっぱり寝てる間に背伸びた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Haven't you gotten taller while you were sleeping?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Haven't you gotten taller while you were sleeping?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことはないと思うけど…」
鈴@「なんかおっきくなったきがする」
理樹@「そうかな…半年前よりは伸びているかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do I? ...I could be a little taller than half a year ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do I? ...I could be a little taller than half a year ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「色々、あったから」
は鈴の顔に手を当てて、顎を反らせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I placed my hand on her chin and lifted her face up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I placed my hand on her chin and lifted her face up.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと膝を折って、目を閉じた鈴に口づけをする。
MESSAGE.EN: As she closed her eyes, I slightly bent my knees to kiss her.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she closed her eyes, I slightly bent my knees to kiss her.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ…
わせてからそっと閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: As our lips met, I closed my own eyes too.
MESSAGE.Translation: As our lips met, I closed my own eyes too.

MESSAGE.JP: れあっているだけのキス。軽く鈴の背中に手を回した。
MESSAGE.EN: While sharing a light kiss, I gently wrapped my arm around her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: While sharing a light kiss, I gently wrapped my arm around her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 服越しに鈴の体を感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel her body through her clothes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel her body through her clothes.

MESSAGE.JP: っそりとしたしなやかで安心する鈴の温もり。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel the comfortable warmth of her slim, flexible body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel the comfortable warmth of her slim, flexible body.

MESSAGE.JP: の大切な鈴。
ん、と靴音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her shoes fall on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her shoes fall on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: い足が伸びてしまい、鈴は背伸びをしていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I seemed to have unconsciously straightened my feet and lifted her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seemed to have unconsciously straightened my feet and lifted her up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、足、大丈夫？」
ーっとしているみたいだ。
理樹@「鈴？」
は深い息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a deep sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a deep sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちょっとだけ、空を飛んだみたいだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I kind of felt like I was flying in the sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I kind of felt like I was flying in the sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「真っ白で…持ち上げられたみたいな…かんじ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Everything was white... and I got lifted up in the air... that's how I felt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Everything was white... and I got lifted up in the air... that's how I felt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「結構面白い」
理樹@「面白い？」
鈴@「…面白い…楽しい…違う…なんていったらいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Enjoyable... Fun... No... How do you think that should be described?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Enjoyable... Fun... No... How do you think that should be described?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、なんだろ…」
鈴@「なんだろ…」
人で考え込む。
鈴@「もっかいして考えよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's try again to get some hints?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's try again to get some hints?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはいいアイデアだね、鈴」
は頷いた。
理樹@「じゃ、もっかい」
鈴@「もっかい…ん…」
は心地よさそうに目を閉じた。
室を出て廊下を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the classroom and walked down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the classroom and walked down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: から部活動をしている音が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear people dedicating themselves to their club activities.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear people dedicating themselves to their club activities.

MESSAGE.JP: 奏楽の金管楽器のドレミファソラシドだったり、ランニングのかけ声だったり。
MESSAGE.EN: The brass band club playing practice notes and the sport club members shouting a running cadence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The brass band club playing practice notes and the sport club members shouting a running cadence.

MESSAGE.JP: れらを聞きながら静かな校舎を歩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I made my way inside the quiet school building, hearing all those sounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made my way inside the quiet school building, hearing all those sounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴？」
は足を止める。
はいつもしているように、僕の上着の裾を指で摘んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was pinching the arm of my uniform as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was pinching the arm of my uniform as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい」
を差し出す。
鈴@「ほい」
しん。
理樹@「うん」
しん。
鈴@「ん」
しん。
、右、最後に両手を挙げてハイタッチ。
MESSAGE.EN: She first high fived my left, then right hand, and finally both hands at once.
MESSAGE.Translation: She first high fived my left, then right hand, and finally both hands at once.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ホーーームランっ」
理樹@「いや、打ってないし」
鈴@「じゃあなんなんだ？」
理樹@「手を繋ごうっていうこと」
は目を丸くして、そっぽを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes widened and she looked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes widened and she looked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「恥ずかしいからヤだ」
そっと呟く。
理樹@「誰も見てないよ」
鈴@「誰かに見られるとハズい」
理樹@「いいじゃん、見られても。恥ずかしいことじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong with being seen? Holding hands isn't anything to be ashamed of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong with being seen? Holding hands isn't anything to be ashamed of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当は恥ずかしいけど、と僕は内心呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually it kind of is, I said to myself in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually it kind of is, I said to myself in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うー…」
鈴@「…こっちでいい」
を持って、ぶんぶん、と振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She grabbed the arm of my uniform and swung it back and forth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She grabbed the arm of my uniform and swung it back and forth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴」
鈴@「うー…そんな目で見るな」
鈴@「そんなに繋ぎたいのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You want to hold my hand that badly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You want to hold my hand that badly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
鈴@「…即答か」
理樹@「うん」
理樹@「うん」
鈴@「うっさい、なんども頷くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Knock it off, you're nodding way too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Knock it off, you're nodding way too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
は頬をふくらませた。
鈴@「…ハズいからイヤだって言ってるのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I said I don't want to because it's embarrassing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I said I don't want to because it's embarrassing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「イヤなんだぞ？」
理樹@「うん」
は頷く。
してじっと鈴の目を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: And I stared her in the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I stared her in the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: の頬は微かに赤く染まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was blushing ever so slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was blushing ever so slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…しょ、しょうがないな…」
ーにした拳を突き出す鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She pushed a fist out toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pushed a fist out toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: るぷる震えている。
鈴@「どーしたっ！」
鈴@「さっさと握れっ」
理樹@「いやグーで出されても。鈴、開いてよ、こぶし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's a fist. Rin, I need you to open your hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's a fist. Rin, I need you to open your hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだと正拳突きしてるみたいだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's more like a karate punch, Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's more like a karate punch, Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「はっ！」
け声もそれっぽいし。
MESSAGE.EN: And that sounded like she was getting fired up for a fight.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that sounded like she was getting fired up for a fight.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こうかっ」
理樹@「そうそう」
っくりと指を絡める。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly entwined my fingers with hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly entwined my fingers with hers.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ。
の細い指の間に僕の指を絡ませる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her thin fingers were now laced with mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her thin fingers were now laced with mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「しみじみとみて、どうしたの鈴？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is something wrong? You went silent all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is something wrong? You went silent all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…絡めすぎてなんかえっちぃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Our hands are so tangled, they feel kinda lewd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Our hands are so tangled, they feel kinda lewd.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そうかな」
鈴@「…理樹が、頼んだんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Because you said you wanted to do this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Because you said you wanted to do this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ありがとう、鈴」
理樹@「じゃあ行こうか…」
鈴@「ど、どどどこまで行くんだ」
理樹@「とりあえず、寮かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Until we get to the dorms, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Until we get to the dorms, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「カバン置いて、恭介たちを探しに行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should go look for Kyousuke and the other guys after we drop our bags off in the dorms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should go look for Kyousuke and the other guys after we drop our bags off in the dorms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そ、そそそそうか」
き出す。
って鈴、なんでそんなに緊張してるかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hold on a second, Rin, what's making you that nervous?
MESSAGE.Translation: Hold on a second, Rin, what's making you that nervous?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、右足と右手が一緒に出てるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you're swinging your arms and legs in sync like a robot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you're swinging your arms and legs in sync like a robot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい馬鹿、かってに出てしまうからしょーがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, dumbass, they're moving on their own, I can't do anything about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, dumbass, they're moving on their own, I can't do anything about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに校内をこうして手を繋いで歩くことなんてなかったからなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I could understand her nervousness; after all, this was our first time walking around inside the school holding hands like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could understand her nervousness; after all, this was our first time walking around inside the school holding hands like this.

MESSAGE.JP: に鈴とこうしていられることに、僕は深く感謝した。
MESSAGE.EN: That made me deeply grateful for being able to do something like this, especially with Rin of all people.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made me deeply grateful for being able to do something like this, especially with Rin of all people.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「また明日ね、鈴」
鈴@「うん」
理樹@「…どうしたの、鈴？」
は僕と手を結んだままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't unclasp her hand from mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't unclasp her hand from mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…なんでもない」
理樹@「そっか。じゃまたあとで、鈴」
鈴@「…うん」
理樹@「すぐまた会えるよ、鈴」
は不安そうに僕を見上げている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was hesitantly looking up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was hesitantly looking up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: んの少しだけの別れ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is only going to be a short parting.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is only going to be a short parting.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯で連絡を取れば直ぐ会える距離になるだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: We're close enough to see each other in a minute if we just text or call.
MESSAGE.Translation: We're close enough to see each other in a minute if we just text or call.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも…ただ、この束の間さえも別れがたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite all that... she can't seem to stand separating with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite all that... she can't seem to stand separating with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…うん。じゃあ約束」
理樹@「約束。ばいばい、鈴」
鈴@「うん…」
が一本ずつ離れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She let go of my fingers, one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let go of my fingers, one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: のたびに初秋のひんやりとした空気がお互いの手をすり抜けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Each time she did, a chilly early autumn breeze came through the gap in our fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each time she did, a chilly early autumn breeze came through the gap in our fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: 間の冷たさに僕たちは二人揃って震える。
MESSAGE.EN: We both shivered with the coldness of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both shivered with the coldness of it.

MESSAGE.JP: っきまで握っていた手から失われる温もり。
MESSAGE.EN: The warmth was taken away from our joined hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warmth was taken away from our joined hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ばいばい、鈴」
はこくり、と頷く。
りん。
の音を響かせて、鈴は女子寮の中へ消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She disappeared into the girls' dorm with a sound of her bell.
MESSAGE.Translation: She disappeared into the girls' dorm with a sound of her bell.

MESSAGE.JP: アを開けると、窓から外を眺めているごつい人影が。
MESSAGE.EN: No sooner than I opened the door, I noticed a large figure peeking into my room from the outside through the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: No sooner than I opened the door, I noticed a large figure peeking into my room from the outside through the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、真人!?　退院今日だったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, Masato!? Did you leave the hospital today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, Masato!? Did you leave the hospital today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おう、理樹。ただいま。会いたかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, Riki. I'm back. I missed you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, Riki. I'm back. I missed you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、見舞いで何度も会ってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I visited you all the time in the hospital, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I visited you all the time in the hospital, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「これでこの部屋も落ち着けるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now that I'm back, this room will feel so comfy again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now that I'm back, this room will feel so comfy again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「むしろいないほうが落ち着いていたけど、これで元通りだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, it was more comfortable without you. Anyway, it's finally back to the way it was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, it was more comfortable without you. Anyway, it's finally back to the way it was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もとさやってやつだな」
理樹@「いや…とんでもない誤用ですから…」
速の真人のボケに突っ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: My role as straight man also made its return.
MESSAGE.Translation: My role as straight man also made its return.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾はまだかかりそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo's gonna take a little more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo's gonna take a little more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あいつは怪我じゃなく、馬鹿だから入院が長引いてるだけだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In his case, it's not his injuries, but his idiocy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In his case, it's not his injuries, but his idiocy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな、普通に骨折してるじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't say that. I know he's got broken bones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't say that. I know he's got broken bones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、おまえっ、あの話知らねぇな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, you don't know what he's doing, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, you don't know what he's doing, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なにかあったの？」
真人@「今、あいつ、ずっと刺繍してるんだぜ」
理樹@「刺繍？　なんの？」
真人@「リトルバスターズジャンパーなるものを作るらしい。わけがわからねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He said he was making a Little Busters jumper. That doesn't make any sense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He said he was making a Little Busters jumper. That doesn't make any sense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはなに？　ユニフォームみたいな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is that, exactly? Some kind of uniform?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is that, exactly? Some kind of uniform?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ。常に着ていたいらしい。ロゴまで作ってやがるんだぜ…相当きてるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah. He's apparently planning to be wearing it all the time. He's even working on a logo for it... He's gone completely nuts, I tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah. He's apparently planning to be wearing it all the time. He's even working on a logo for it... He's gone completely nuts, I tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぇ、と思う。
理樹@「でも、それが素直な気持ちなんだよ。温かく見守ってあげようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But if those are his true feelings, we should just keep quiet and support him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But if those are his true feelings, we should just keep quiet and support him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「最初だけは突っ込まざるをえないぜ？　スルーなんてとてもじゃないができねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm sure you'll sing a different tune when you first see him. It's too impossible to accept all his changes instantly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm sure you'll sing a different tune when you first see him. It's too impossible to accept all his changes instantly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「第一声は、はぁー!?だ。間違いねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You'll be like, 'What the hell!?', no mistake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You'll be like, 'What the hell!?', no mistake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでいいよ」
人はすっかり普段通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato is already the him that I know.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato is already the him that I know.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスメイトのほとんどは夏休み中ずっと入院していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Most of my classmates were in the hospital for the whole summer vacation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Most of my classmates were in the hospital for the whole summer vacation.

MESSAGE.JP: 室には復帰する人が段々増えてきている。
MESSAGE.EN: They are gradually coming back to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: They are gradually coming back to school.

MESSAGE.JP: れが僕には嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And I'm really glad about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I'm really glad about that.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちょっと早いが、飯いくかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a little early, but why don't we go grab dinner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a little early, but why don't we go grab dinner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
真人@「病院の食事はいまいちだったからな。久々にまともなもん食えるぜ。ご飯のおかわりもし放題。うひょー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The food back in the hospital wasn't too good. I'll finally get to eat something decent. I'm gonna stuff myself full of rice. Whee!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The food back in the hospital wasn't too good. I'll finally get to eat something decent. I'm gonna stuff myself full of rice. Whee!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな、いきなり食べたら駄目だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you should eat that much right after getting out of the hospital.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you should eat that much right after getting out of the hospital.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と一緒に部屋を出た。
し夕食には早い時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a tad early for dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a tad early for dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 食はまばらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There were only a few people in the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were only a few people in the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 際のテーブルに座った。
MESSAGE.EN: We picked a table by the windows.
MESSAGE.Translation: We picked a table by the windows.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あと、カレーつけていいか？」
理樹@「駄目」
真人@「エビチリなら…」
理樹@「それも却下」
真人@「ちぇ、なんだよ理樹」
真人@「心配してくれやがってからにっ」
人が選んだのはタンパク質…というわけで豆腐とツナのサラダ。
MESSAGE.EN: He ended up choosing protein... as in tofu, tuna salad...
MESSAGE.Translation: He ended up choosing protein... as in tofu, tuna salad...

MESSAGE.JP: れにカツ丼。
鈴@「あ…いた」
たちがやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and the other girls arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and the other girls arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: が椅子を引くと、鈴が隣に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: I moved my chair and Rin sat down next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I moved my chair and Rin sat down next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「真人君たちの退院は今日だったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Masato-kun, you got out of the hospital today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Masato-kun, you got out of the hospital today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「真人君、退院おめでとー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's so good to see you doing better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's so good to see you doing better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あー真人くんだー。やはー」
ってきた来ヶ谷さんたちも席に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: The other girls took seats too.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other girls took seats too.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「げぇっ三枝ぁっ！」
真人@「っておまえ、オレのタクアン食うなよ！」
葉留佳@「んー…漬け物はいいねぇ。アミノ酸を摂ると落ち着くねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm... these things are good. Amino acids always make me feel at ease.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm... these things are good. Amino acids always make me feel at ease.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえ自分で言っててわかってんのかその意味が」
クド@「どーぶるーう゛ぇーちゃるー」
クド@「井ノ原さん、おひさしぶりです」
美魚@「病院で会ってますけどね」
クド@「学食では、という意味ですよー、西園さん」
端ににぎにぎしくなったテーブル。
と視線が合った。
理樹@（どうかした？）
るふる。
でもないらしい。
い、と視線が逸らされる…けれど、テーブルの下で伸ばされた手がふらふらしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She quickly pulled her eyes away from me... though I found her swinging her stretched-out arm sideways under the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She quickly pulled her eyes away from me... though I found her swinging her stretched-out arm sideways under the table.

MESSAGE.JP: はそっとそれを握る。
の顔を見ると、微かに頬を赤くしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She slightly blushed as I moved my eyes back to her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slightly blushed as I moved my eyes back to her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、会えた」
から、全然不安がることなんてない。
MESSAGE.EN: So she doesn't need to be worried at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: So she doesn't need to be worried at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
理樹@「おやすみ、鈴」
鈴@「…おやすみ」
はそっと鈴の頬にキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently kissed her on the cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently kissed her on the cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: が女子寮に入っていくのを確認して、僕も部屋に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After seeing her into the dorm, I went back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After seeing her into the dorm, I went back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはようー」
クラスメイト@「おはよう、直枝」
クラスメイト@「おはよう直枝君」
室に入ってきたクラスメイトたちに挨拶を返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I greeted the classmates who came in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I greeted the classmates who came in.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うぅ…」
人が唸っている。
理樹@「まだお腹痛いの？」
真人@「痛くはねぇが胸焼けが…うう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's gone, but now I've got heartburn... Uuh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's gone, but now I've got heartburn... Uuh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いなくなったと思ったら、また学食に戻って食べまくるからだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You asked for it. You went back to the cafeteria to eat more last night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You asked for it. You went back to the cafeteria to eat more last night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うぅ…入院生活でまさか胃がここまで弱っていたとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uuu... I wouldn't have expected that the hospital stay weakened my stomach this much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uuu... I wouldn't have expected that the hospital stay weakened my stomach this much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「よーし、ＨＲ始めるぞー」
らりと扉を開けて先生が入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The teacher opened the door and entered.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teacher opened the door and entered.

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「補習が数時間あるから予定にいれておくように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝You guys are going to have remedial classes. Make sure to note them on your schedule.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝You guys are going to have remedial classes. Make sure to note them on your schedule.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 師の言葉に悲鳴があがる。
MESSAGE.EN: The whole class moaned in protest.
MESSAGE.Translation: The whole class moaned in protest.

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「授業の遅れをがんばって取り戻さなくちゃな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝You all have to catch up with the curriculum.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝You all have to catch up with the curriculum.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「さて…そのほかの連絡事項はー…」
教師@「えーと、井ノ原ー、あとで赤点の補習通知あるから職員室に来るように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Oh, Inohara, we'll talk about the remedial class for your failing grade. Come visit me in the faculty room afterward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Oh, Inohara, we'll talk about the remedial class for your failing grade. Come visit me in the faculty room afterward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「泣きっ面に涙ぁーー!!」
理樹@「ひたすら泣いてるだけだよね、それ…」
んなこんなで今日も始まるのだった。
我が比較的軽かった僕たちには補習はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and I were assigned no supplemental study because we had been only lightly injured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and I were assigned no supplemental study because we had been only lightly injured.

MESSAGE.JP: な僕の相手は、だから鈴ということになる。
MESSAGE.EN: That made her the only person I could hang out with.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made her the only person I could hang out with.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴ー？」
く色づいた広葉樹が風に吹かれてざわざわと音を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: Red leaves were rustling whenever a breeze blew.
MESSAGE.Translation: Red leaves were rustling whenever a breeze blew.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、いた…鈴…」
びかけに返事がないのも無理はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly learned why she hadn't answered me when I called her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly learned why she hadn't answered me when I called her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「すぅ…」
にもたれて鈴は寝息を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sleeping, leaning on the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sleeping, leaning on the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: の周りには猫たちが文字通りごろごろしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Around her were her cats, chilling out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Around her were her cats, chilling out.

MESSAGE.JP: が近づいても猫たちは我関せずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They didn't pay any attention to me as I got closer.
MESSAGE.Translation: They didn't pay any attention to me as I got closer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴？」
う一度呼びかけてみる。
鈴@「…ん…馬鹿…」
を見てるのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be seeing a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be seeing a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「馬鹿…それは…食べ物じゃない…理樹の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Idiot... That is... not food... That's Riki's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Idiot... That is... not food... That's Riki's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（どんな夢を見てるんだろ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What kind of dream is she seeing...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What kind of dream is she seeing...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 生に手をついて、起こさないように側に寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: I quietly crawled on my hands and knees so as not to wake her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quietly crawled on my hands and knees so as not to wake her up.

MESSAGE.JP: を抱えて寝ている鈴に顔を近づける。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought my face next to hers. She was sleeping with her arms wrapped around her legs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought my face next to hers. She was sleeping with her arms wrapped around her legs.

MESSAGE.JP: かな寝息。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear her quiet breathing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear her quiet breathing.

MESSAGE.JP: んな間近で見ているのに鈴は起きない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still sleeping soundly even when I was this close.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still sleeping soundly even when I was this close.

MESSAGE.JP: はさらに顔を近づけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought my face even closer to hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought my face even closer to hers.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴」
日も猫たちと放課後ずっと遊んでいたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She had apparently played with her cats the whole time after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had apparently played with her cats the whole time after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 意に思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled something out of the blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled something out of the blue.

MESSAGE.JP: んでいていつのまにか公園で寝こけてしまった小さいころのこと。
MESSAGE.EN: There was this one time when we played around so much that we got tired and fell asleep in a park.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was this one time when we played around so much that we got tired and fell asleep in a park.

MESSAGE.JP: 介がくっつきながら寝ていた僕たちを見つけて呆れていたっけ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can still remember the dumbfounded look Kyousuke gave us when he found us there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can still remember the dumbfounded look Kyousuke gave us when he found us there.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…起きない…よね…」
の良い鈴の唇を見ている間にいたずらっ気が起る。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her well-shaped lips urged me to mischief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her well-shaped lips urged me to mischief.

MESSAGE.JP: の唇を盗みたくて、僕はそろそろと近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I snuck closer to try to give her a kiss.
MESSAGE.Translation: I snuck closer to try to give her a kiss.

MESSAGE.JP: きどきどき…
ち、と鈴の目が開いた。
理樹@「…お、おはよう鈴」
ちぱち。目をしばたたかせた鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She blinked her eyes a couple times.
MESSAGE.Translation: She blinked her eyes a couple times.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…しないの？」
顔でそんなことを訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked with a straight face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked with a straight face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「してもいい？」
鈴@「うん」
可が出たので…僕はキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: I got her permission... and kissed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got her permission... and kissed her.

MESSAGE.JP: ゅ、ちゅ。ちゅ。
後にちょこん、とほっぺたにキスをした。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended with a kiss on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended with a kiss on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー…」
の頬に手が伸びる。
たぺた。ぺたぺた。
理樹@「どうかしたの、鈴？」
いかけに答えず僕の頬を軽く撫でた手が離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She pulled her hand back without answering my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled her hand back without answering my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんでもない」
にかむ鈴に僕はキスの続きをしようとする…
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to continue kissing Rin, who now wore a shy look on her face...
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to continue kissing Rin, who now wore a shy look on her face...

MESSAGE.JP: ン！
理樹@「うわぁっ！」
の鳴き声に振り向くと猫が過積載状態のストレルカが居た。
MESSAGE.EN: As I turned in the direction of the bark, there was Strelka with way too many cats on her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I turned in the direction of the bark, there was Strelka with way too many cats on her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ストレルカ？　おつかれさま」
ぎらいの声に、ストレルカはお座りをして、
MESSAGE.EN: Rin praised her, and she sat down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin praised her, and she sat down.

MESSAGE.JP: ン！　と一声吠えた。
内に散らばっている猫たちを鈴のために集めてきたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to have fetched those cats from all across the school property.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to have fetched those cats from all across the school property.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…おいで」
たぱた。ストレルカの足下から子犬が走ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Puppies came running from under Strelka's feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Puppies came running from under Strelka's feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よしよし、ペリメニ」
鈴@「こら、噛むなココナッツ」
と灰色のまだらな子犬はストレルカの子供たちだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The white-and-gray mottled puppies were Strelka's.
MESSAGE.Translation: The white-and-gray mottled puppies were Strelka's.

MESSAGE.JP: の秋生まれたらしい。
ドが居ない間、子犬たちの世話も鈴の日課の一つになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin is in charge of taking care of them while Kud is away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin is in charge of taking care of them while Kud is away.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こ、こら、そんなとこ舐めるなっ」
ンオン。
庭の猫（と犬）密度は途端に上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: The density of animals in the courtyard was rapidly increasing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The density of animals in the courtyard was rapidly increasing.

MESSAGE.JP: ォンォン。
鈴@「…何、ストレルカ？」
ン！
鈴@「…もうそんな時間？」
鈴@「んーっ…」
手を右腕に当てて鈴は背伸びをした。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin locked her left hand onto her right arm and stretched her back out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin locked her left hand onto her right arm and stretched her back out.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よくねた」
理樹@「寝過ぎだよ鈴」
鈴@「だって気持いいんだからしょうがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I couldn't help it, it's so comfy out here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I couldn't help it, it's so comfy out here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…そして寝てるあたしにキスをしようとするのが一匹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...And there's a kitten right here that tried to kiss me while I was asleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...And there's a kitten right here that tried to kiss me while I was asleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、匹って。
鈴@「めー」
に叱る時のように、ぴん、と人差し指を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed a finger at me just like when she scolded a cat for doing something naughty.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed a finger at me just like when she scolded a cat for doing something naughty.

MESSAGE.JP: の指で僕の額をつついた。
MESSAGE.EN: She then poked me on the forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then poked me on the forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめんなさい」
られてしまった。
鈴@「ご飯食べにいく？」
理樹@「そうだね」
生から立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: We stood up on the grass.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stood up on the grass.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「飼育部とか作ろうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe we should start an animal rearing club or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe we should start an animal rearing club or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 庭を見渡してみると、そんなことを思うのも致し方ない光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The view of the courtyard brought that idea to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The view of the courtyard brought that idea to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴が部長でさ」
鈴@「あたし、部長さん？」
トレルカの背中を撫でているとポニーテールが尻尾みたいにひょこひょこ動くのが見える。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her ponytail swaying as she was petting Strelka on the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her ponytail swaying as she was petting Strelka on the back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうそう」
鈴@「部長…ぶちょう…ぶちょー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Leader... L e a d e r... Leader?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Leader... L e a d e r... Leader?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。部長部長。よっ、棗ぶちょー」
鈴@「えへん」
らしそうだ。むやみやたらに。
MESSAGE.EN: She meaninglessly put on an arrogant look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She meaninglessly put on an arrogant look.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ部長行きますか」
鈴@「うむ。皆のもの出陣！」
のノリのまま鈴は猫の一群（と犬）を引き連れて歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She then walked away, accompanied by the herd of cats and dogs.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then walked away, accompanied by the herd of cats and dogs.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…なんで来ない」
して戻ってきた。
理樹@「いや、どこ行くのかな、と思って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I was wondering where you guys were going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I was wondering where you guys were going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「行き先をちゃんと指定しろ、馬鹿っ」
理樹@「ごめんごめん、とりあえず…学食いこ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry about that. Um... let's go to the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry about that. Um... let's go to the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそう言って歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I made the call and started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made the call and started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: り戻した日々はこんなにも緩やかだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We've finally gotten our usual days back, and they are incredibly peaceful.
MESSAGE.Translation: We've finally gotten our usual days back, and they are incredibly peaceful.

MESSAGE.JP: れでいて鮮やかで美しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, they are vivid and beautiful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, they are vivid and beautiful.

MESSAGE.JP: 難とか悪意とかそんなモノがあると知った今でさえも…僕は僕らの世界にいることを幸福に思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though we both now know there are things like adversity and malice out there... I'm happy that I'm here in this world of ours.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though we both now know there are things like adversity and malice out there... I'm happy that I'm here in this world of ours.

MESSAGE.JP: くしやすく…失われやすいもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There are so many things that you can easily lose.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are so many things that you can easily lose.

MESSAGE.JP: から、手に入れたものを一つ一つ大事にしていこう。
MESSAGE.EN: So I'll treasure each and every one of the things that I have.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I'll treasure each and every one of the things that I have.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう、鈴」
鈴@「ん」
りん。
理樹@「ふぁ…」
わずあくびが出てしまう。
鈴@「朝からだらしないぞ、理樹」
理樹@「そうはいっても…やっぱり眠いよ」
理樹@「眠りの質が鈴は深いのかなぁ…」
理樹@「ＨＲ終わったら起こしてって真人に頼んでおいたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I asked Masato to wake me up when homeroom was over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I asked Masato to wake me up when homeroom was over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も教室には誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was no one else but us in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was no one else but us in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: から入ってくる風で、カーテンが緩やかに波打っているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The only movement came from the curtains fluttering in the wind which came from the open window.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only movement came from the curtains fluttering in the wind which came from the open window.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「寝る子は育つ」
理樹@「もう寝てる間に身長が伸びる年じゃないよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm too old to grow taller while sleeping, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm too old to grow taller while sleeping, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで他のみんなは？」
鈴@「どっか行った」
理樹@「ひどいな、僕はおいてけぼりか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't believe they left me behind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't believe they left me behind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「寝こけてるからだぞ」
理樹@「それもそっか…あ、鈴は行かなかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fair enough... Wait, why didn't you go with them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fair enough... Wait, why didn't you go with them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「残していけないから」
理樹@「あぁ、そうなんだ…ごめん」
の時、僕らに起こっていたことは、結局なんだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I still wonder, what was it that happened to us back then?
MESSAGE.Translation: I still wonder, what was it that happened to us back then?

MESSAGE.JP: ぼろげだけど…いくつかの記憶の断片は、僕にも残っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though they are vague... I still retain some memories about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though they are vague... I still retain some memories about it.

MESSAGE.JP: れこそ、本当にただの夢だったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it really was just a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it really was just a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、確かにそれは、今ここにいる僕に影響を及ぼして…。
MESSAGE.EN: But there's one thing I know for certain: I have changed in many ways after that incident...
MESSAGE.Translation: But there's one thing I know for certain: I have changed in many ways after that incident...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「りきく～んっ」
葉留佳@「最新情報ですよっ」
理樹@「え、なに？」
葉留佳@「ふっふっふ、それはですネ…」
美魚@「…宮沢さんが帰ってくるそうです」
葉留佳@「ああぁーっ!!　私のセリフーっ!!」
クド@「宮沢さんにお会いするのも、とても久しぶりなのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's been so long since I last saw him～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's been so long since I last saw him～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…理樹君」
理樹@「ん…」
小毬@「これで、９人だねっ」
理樹@「…うん、そうだね」
顔の小毬さんに、笑顔で返す。
うして、みんなと一緒に、平凡な日常を送る事が出来ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like this, our ordinary days had resumed with them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like this, our ordinary days had resumed with them.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうなると、残りはあとひとりか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And that means there's only one left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And that means there's only one left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう、かな」
とひとり。
介が戻ってきたら、僕たち『リトルバスターズ』は、元通りになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Once Kyousuke comes back, the ❛Little Busters❜ will be back to the way we were.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once Kyousuke comes back, the ❛Little Busters❜ will be back to the way we were.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「宮沢が戻ってきたぞーっ」
室に駆け込んでくる生徒が、そう叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A classmate ran into the room and yelled out.
MESSAGE.Translation: A classmate ran into the room and yelled out.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あー、きたみたいだよっ」
謙吾@「…久しぶりだな、みんな」
葉杖を付いた謙吾が、教室に入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo walked into the room with a crutch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo walked into the room with a crutch.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「おかえりなさい～」
クド@「おかえりですっ」
斉に、みんなで取り囲む。
葉留佳@「やー、お互い災難でしたネっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it was such a bummer for you and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it was such a bummer for you and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「…足の方は、その後どうでしょうか」
謙吾@「なに、ギプスも外れた事だし、こう大げさにするまでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, I don't have the cast anymore, so I don't think I even need this thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, I don't have the cast anymore, so I don't think I even need this thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉杖をひょい、と持ち上げ、一歩足を踏み出してみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted his crutch in the air and took a step with his injured foot.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted his crutch in the air and took a step with his injured foot.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「へ、平気だ」
鈴@「冷や汗かいてるぞこいつ」
来ヶ谷@「そのようすじゃ、まだ大暴れは出来んな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like you still can't act as you please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like you still can't act as you please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「しばらくはおとなしくしているがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You'd better stay quiet for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You'd better stay quiet for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ぐむ…」
真人@「へ…しょうがねえな」
真人@「早く治しちまえよ。決着はそのあとだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Get your leg recovered already. Then we'll decide which of us is the strongest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Get your leg recovered already. Then we'll decide which of us is the strongest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「決着か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Decide which of us is the strongest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Decide which of us is the strongest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…そうだな。そんなものをつけるのも、悪くない」
真人@「へへ…」
謙吾@「ふっ…」
ふたりが、笑い合う。
小毬@「…うん、これであと恭介さんだけだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...All right, Kyousuke-san is the only one left now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...All right, Kyousuke-san is the only one left now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…そうだね」
恭介は一番の重症だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Out of everyone on the bus, Kyousuke was injured the worst.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Out of everyone on the bus, Kyousuke was injured the worst.

MESSAGE.JP: の後も、すぐに集中治療室に担ぎ込まれ、誰ひとりとして面会を許されない状況だった。
MESSAGE.EN: After our rescue, he was immediately wheeled into an intensive care unit, and wasn't allowed visitors.
MESSAGE.Translation: After our rescue, he was immediately wheeled into an intensive care unit, and wasn't allowed visitors.

MESSAGE.JP: んなが地元の病院に移動したあとにも、恭介だけは他の大きな病院へと移された。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after the rest of us moved to a local hospital, only he had to move to some other, bigger hospital.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after the rest of us moved to a local hospital, only he had to move to some other, bigger hospital.

MESSAGE.JP: 配じゃない、といったら嘘になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried about him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried about him.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、恭介はきっと、帰ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I knew that he'd be back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I knew that he'd be back.

MESSAGE.JP: れまで、もうちょっとの間。
MESSAGE.EN: And what I had to do until that day...
MESSAGE.Translation: And what I had to do until that day...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、今日は何しようか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what are we gonna do today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what are we gonna do today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の代わりに、リトルバスターズをまとめていくのが、僕のするべきことだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...was lead the Little Busters in his place.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...was lead the Little Busters in his place.

MESSAGE.JP: あの事故は、奇跡だといわれていた。
発が起こる前に、全員を救出できたのは、一体なぜだったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: How on earth could all the students get rescued before the bus exploded?
MESSAGE.Translation: How on earth could all the students get rescued before the bus exploded?

MESSAGE.JP: んの少し、その事が騒がれたけど、僕と鈴の名前が出ることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: For a short while, people were feverishly trying to puzzle it out, but their inquiries never reached me and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a short while, people were feverishly trying to puzzle it out, but their inquiries never reached me and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 跡の立役者、なんていったらおこがましいだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I wouldn't presume to describe us two as miracle workers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wouldn't presume to describe us two as miracle workers.

MESSAGE.JP: っとその奇跡は、何か…神様とか、そんなのが起こしたものなんてのじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I don't believe that the miracle was caused by something abstract like... a god, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I don't believe that the miracle was caused by something abstract like... a god, either.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らが、それを起こしたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was something we, the Little Busters, made happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was something we, the Little Busters, made happen.

MESSAGE.JP: 休みも過ぎ、新学期が始まるころには、事故に巻き込まれたみんなもだいぶ帰ってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: By the time the summer break ended and our new semester began, most of the injured classmates had made a successful recovery.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the time the summer break ended and our new semester began, most of the injured classmates had made a successful recovery.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、まだいくつかの空席がある。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, you could find several empty desks even now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, you could find several empty desks even now.

MESSAGE.JP: あれだけの事故だ。まだ完治せずに、入院したままの人だっている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There were still some people recovering in the hospital, which should be no surprise considering the severity of the accident.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There were still some people recovering in the hospital, which should be no surprise considering the severity of the accident.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、命に関わる深刻な怪我をした人がひとりとしていなかったのは、本当に不幸中の幸いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But even so, the fact that not a single one received fatal injuries was a real blessing in disguise.
MESSAGE.Translation: But even so, the fact that not a single one received fatal injuries was a real blessing in disguise.

MESSAGE.JP: らも、しばらくは教室でおとなしくする事にしている。
MESSAGE.EN: So our team had decided to spend our time quietly in the classroom for the time being.
MESSAGE.Translation: So our team had decided to spend our time quietly in the classroom for the time being.

MESSAGE.JP: んなはちょっぴり退屈そうにするけど、さすがに怪我人もいる中、また野球の練習なんてのは無理だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Although some looked a bit bored with it, it was too early for us to start baseball practice again as long as we still had injured members.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although some looked a bit bored with it, it was too early for us to start baseball practice again as long as we still had injured members.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおっしゃーっ！　バッチこいやーっ!!」
謙吾@「ふん…いくぞっ」
きーんっ!!
真人@「うおおっ、強烈なライナーだが…捕ったぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoohh, I just hit such a powerful line drive... but he caught it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoohh, I just hit such a powerful line drive... but he caught it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って廊下でなにやってるんだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, what are you guys doing in the hall!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, what are you guys doing in the hall!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: くおとなしくできないふたりがここにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only these two wouldn't stay quiet at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only these two wouldn't stay quiet at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾も怪我がまだ治ってないんだから無茶しちゃダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo, you can't do stuff like this. Remember that you're still injured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo, you can't do stuff like this. Remember that you're still injured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「むう…」
真人@「ははっ、怒られてやんの」
謙吾@「…なんだと？　そもそもやろうと言い出したのはおまえだろうがっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What the hell? Wasn't this your idea in the first place!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What the hell? Wasn't this your idea in the first place!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へっ…やろうってのかい」
謙吾@「無論だ…斬り捨てるのみっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Of course I do... I'll just cut you down!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course I do... I'll just cut you down!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だーかーらー!!　そういうのは怪我治るまで禁止っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you guys hear me!! No fighting until you've recovered!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you guys hear me!! No fighting until you've recovered!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: このふたりをまとめるだけでも大変だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looking after these two is such a handful.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looking after these two is such a handful.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「でもなー、私ももうちょっとにゅーいんしたままだったらなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But I wish I were still in the hospital.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But I wish I were still in the hospital.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「単純に夏休みが減っただけですヨ、私は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Now all I ended up gaining was a shorter summer vacation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Now all I ended up gaining was a shorter summer vacation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほう、足も動かずベッドに寝たままの方がよかったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hoh, you're saying that you would prefer to just lie in bed without even being able to walk?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hoh, you're saying that you would prefer to just lie in bed without even being able to walk?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あ、いやー、それはいやかも…」
留佳さんは夏休み中に傷もほとんど治ってしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Haruka-san made an almost complete recovery during the break.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Haruka-san made an almost complete recovery during the break.

MESSAGE.JP: 学期の初日には、『ノリでバスを変えたのが大失敗でしたネ』と笑顔で語っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When we met her on the first day of the new semester, she said ❛It was such a big mistake that I changed the bus on a whim,❜ all smiles.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we met her on the first day of the new semester, she said ❛It was such a big mistake that I changed the bus on a whim,❜ all smiles.

MESSAGE.JP: それと、休みの間に姉妹の佳奈多さんと仲直りをしたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Plus, she and Kanata-san seem to have made up during the vacation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Plus, she and Kanata-san seem to have made up during the vacation.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、相変らず顔をあわせれば口論で、騒がしい葉留佳さんを追いかける風紀委員の数が減る事はなかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, they still quarrel every time they face each other, and the prefects chase after Haruka-san just like before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, they still quarrel every time they face each other, and the prefects chase after Haruka-san just like before.

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「…わたしはもう少し休みでも一向に構わなかったのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...I wouldn't have minded having a few more days off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...I wouldn't have minded having a few more days off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「ゆっくり本を読む、いい機会でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I could have enjoyed reading in peace and quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I could have enjoyed reading in peace and quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは、足を骨折していたらしい。
れど、折れ方が綺麗だったらしく、一ヶ月もすればギプスも取れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But since it was a clean fracture, she only had to wear a cast for a month.
MESSAGE.Translation: But since it was a clean fracture, she only had to wear a cast for a month.

MESSAGE.JP: れと…前より、笑顔になる事が多くなった気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: And here's a change about her too: I feel that she smiles much more often than before.
MESSAGE.Translation: And here's a change about her too: I feel that she smiles much more often than before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば、クドは大変だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, you sure had a hard time, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, you sure had a hard time, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、でも今はもう平気です」
クド@「…私には、帰る場所が出来ましたからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Because I have a place to go back to now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Because I have a place to go back to now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しくは聞いていないけれど、クドの『故郷』で大きな事件があったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't privy to the details, but a big incident had taken place in Kud's ❛homeland.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't privy to the details, but a big incident had taken place in Kud's ❛homeland.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れど、それもなんだか丸く収まったようで、クドはいつでも故郷に戻る事が出来るようになった、とのことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But the situation had subsided somehow, and now it seems that she can travel back there whenever she wants.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the situation had subsided somehow, and now it seems that she can travel back there whenever she wants.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　ゆいちゃん、どうしたの？」
来ヶ谷@「いや、ゆいちゃんと呼ぶなと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, I told you not to call me Yui-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, I told you not to call me Yui-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「別に、なんでもないさ」
ヶ谷さんに関しては、僕は全く何も覚えていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't remember anything at all about Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't remember anything at all about Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: のみんなも、あのときのことはあまり話さないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: No one else really talked about the accident either.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one else really talked about the accident either.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは、本当に何ひとつ話そうとはしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But she thoroughly refused to mention a thing about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she thoroughly refused to mention a thing about it.

MESSAGE.JP: その話が出ると、来ヶ谷さんは、笑ってどこかへ行ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Each time someone brought up the subject, she went away, laughing her laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Each time someone brought up the subject, she went away, laughing her laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: んの少し、寂しそうな笑顔で。
MESSAGE.EN: Wearing a smile that looked a little bit lonely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wearing a smile that looked a little bit lonely.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、本当によかったよ」
葉留佳@「ん、なにが？」
小毬@「あと少しで、全部元通り」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Things will go back to the way they used to be soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Things will go back to the way they used to be soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ。恭介さんも早く戻ってこないかなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I hope Kyousuke-san comes back quickly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I hope Kyousuke-san comes back quickly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは、本当に嬉しそうに、そう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san's voice was full of delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san's voice was full of delight.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんと鈴は、あれから、ずっと仲が良くなったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She and Rin have gotten much closer to each other since the accident.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and Rin have gotten much closer to each other since the accident.

MESSAGE.JP: みたいに鈴も照れくさそうにしないし、自然に笑っているように見える。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin doesn't get shy in front of her anymore, but smiles naturally instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin doesn't get shy in front of her anymore, but smiles naturally instead.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、本当の意味で『友達』になれる何かがあったんじゃないかと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe that they have gone through something that made them true ❛friends.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe that they have gone through something that made them true ❛friends.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れが、ずっと心配していた鈴の成長のように思えて、僕は嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was really glad to see such growth in her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was really glad to see such growth in her.

MESSAGE.JP: 色々あったけど。
らは今、『いつもどおり』の中にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: we are all ❛back to usual❜ now,
MESSAGE.Translation: we are all ❛back to usual❜ now,

MESSAGE.JP: ったひとりの帰還を、今か今かと待ち焦がれながら。
MESSAGE.EN: waiting patiently for a certain person's return.
MESSAGE.Translation: waiting patiently for a certain person's return.

MESSAGE.JP: 々は、続いていく。
課後。
に今は野球の練習をしているわけじゃないけど、僕らは集合場所としてここに集まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Although it's not for baseball practice, we use this place as our gathering spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although it's not for baseball practice, we use this place as our gathering spot.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ…」
日は僕が一番乗りみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I seemed to be the first one to arrive today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seemed to be the first one to arrive today.

MESSAGE.JP: 人と謙吾もジュース買いに行ってから来るらしいし、ちょっと待つ事にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo were coming after getting drinks, so I figured I'd just wait for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo were coming after getting drinks, so I figured I'd just wait for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっとした間があると、ふと恭介のことが浮かんできてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: When I had nothing to do, my thoughts always turned to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I had nothing to do, my thoughts always turned to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 休みだって、新学期からの生活だって、きっと恭介がいればもっと楽しかっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: With him here, our summer break and this first part of the new semester could have been so much more fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: With him here, our summer break and this first part of the new semester could have been so much more fun.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろん、今が楽しくないわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Of course, I wasn't about to complain about the way things were now.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Of course, I wasn't about to complain about the way things were now.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、やっぱり…どこかにぽっかりと穴が開いているような気持ちになる。
MESSAGE.EN: But I just couldn't help feeling... that there was a huge hole somewhere in my soul.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I just couldn't help feeling... that there was a huge hole somewhere in my soul.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹」
理樹@「ん、早いね」
が入ってくる。
鈴@「…みんなはまだか」
っか、と僕の向かいの椅子に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the seat opposite me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the seat opposite me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「前から聞きたかったんだ」
理樹@「え、なに？」
鈴@「おまえ誰が好きなんだ」
理樹@「ぶっ…」
思いっきり予想外の言葉が鈴の口から飛び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Something totally unexpected jumped out of her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Something totally unexpected jumped out of her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや誰って言われても」
鈴@「…あたしなりに色々考えたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I've been trying to figure it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I've been trying to figure it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だがよくわからん」
鈴@「あたしは理樹が好きなのか？」
理樹@「ちょっとちょっと…いきなり性急過ぎるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on, hold on... It's too sudden...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on, hold on... It's too sudden...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それに、そんなの僕に訊かれてもわかるわけないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And besides, how can I tell if you're in love with me or not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And besides, how can I tell if you're in love with me or not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
を組んで悩みだす。
MESSAGE.EN: She sank into thought with her arms folded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sank into thought with her arms folded.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、鈴にはまだそういう気持ちはわからないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...When it comes down to it, she still can't understand that kind of feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...When it comes down to it, she still can't understand that kind of feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は恭介のことはどう思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, how do you feel about Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, how do you feel about Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん…あいつか」
鈴@「いなきゃ困る」
理樹@「じゃあ、僕は？」
鈴@「いなきゃ困る」
理樹@「同じなんじゃないかなぁ」
鈴@「うーーーん…」
た腕を組んで考え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet again she started thinking with her arms crossed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again she started thinking with her arms crossed.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がそういう恋愛を始めるのは、もうちょっと先のことになりそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I suppose it's still a little too early for her to actually start dating.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I suppose it's still a little too early for her to actually start dating.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「で、おまえ誰が好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, who are you in love with?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, who are you in love with?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こにもどるのかっ。
MESSAGE.EN: She got back to the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got back to the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、だから…」
鈴@「こまりちゃんか」
鈴@「こまりちゃんはやさしいし、いいお嫁さんになりそうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She's very kind, so I'm sure she'll be a good wife...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She's very kind, so I'm sure she'll be a good wife...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んどん話を進めていく。
理樹@「あの…鈴？」
鈴@「クドはかわいいし、みおもいっしょにいるとおちつく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kud's adorable, and Mio is comfortable to be around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kud's adorable, and Mio is comfortable to be around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くるがやはきれーだし頼りになりそうだ」
鈴@「はるかは…」
鈴@「微妙だがすごく楽しいやつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She doesn't have a lot I can praise, but she's a very fun girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She doesn't have a lot I can praise, but she's a very fun girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の頭の中で僕の相手を色々シミュレートしているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She appeared to be simulating how it would go if I dated each girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She appeared to be simulating how it would go if I dated each girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「え、何の話？　私微妙？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh, what are you talking about? I don't have what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, what are you talking about? I don't have what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つの間にか葉留佳さんが入ってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before we realized it, Haruka-san had entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before we realized it, Haruka-san had entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「お菓子持ってきたよ～」
クド@「すぐにお茶淹れますっ」
やどやとみんな入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone came in right after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone came in right after her.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふわふわストロベリー買って来たよ～」
小毬@「理樹君、前に食べたがってたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you wanted to eat them before, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, you wanted to eat them before, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん。ありがとう」
鈴@「こまりちゃんなら許す」
小毬@「ふえ？」
来ヶ谷@「なるほどなるほど」
したのか、来ヶ谷さんは頷きながら僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san must have grasped it instantly; she was looking at me and nodding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san must have grasped it instantly; she was looking at me and nodding.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「鈴君は理樹君のお節介な妹といったところか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'd describe Rin-kun as something like a slightly meddlesome little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'd describe Rin-kun as something like a slightly meddlesome little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「…なるほど」
美魚@「直枝さんもいい妹さんを持って幸せ者ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Naoe-san, you're quite blessed to have such a good little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Naoe-san, you're quite blessed to have such a good little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いもうとか」
鈴@「頼りない兄だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What an unreliable big brother I have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What an unreliable big brother I have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそんなダメ出しされても…」
鈴@「とりあえず、察しがいいくるがやとみおも合格だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Anyways, Kurugaya and Mio also qualify because they catch on quick.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Anyways, Kurugaya and Mio also qualify because they catch on quick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それは光栄だな」
美魚@「…はあ」
園さんは良くわかっていないようだった。
クド@「リキ、お茶が入りましたよ」
理樹@「あ、悪いねクド」
クド@「いえいえ。みなさんもどうぞです」
鈴@「クドも許す」
クド@「はい？　なんだかわからないですが、許されましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What? I don't know what's going on, but I'm qualified!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What? I don't know what's going on, but I'm qualified!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 々に認可が下りていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin qualified them one after another...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin qualified them one after another...

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「えー？　私は私はー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehh? What about me, what about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehh? What about me, what about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「はるかはうるさい」
葉留佳@「なんか私だけめっちゃ虐げられてるっ!?」
鈴@「…だがそこがいいところだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...But I think that's one of the good things about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...But I think that's one of the good things about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「おおっ、逆転満塁ホームランがきたーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wow, I just hit a grand slam homerun into a come-from-behind victory!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wow, I just hit a grand slam homerun into a come-from-behind victory!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「鈴ちゃん可愛いっ!!　私からも大合格っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Rin-chan, you're so sweet!! Let me qualify you too!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Rin-chan, you're so sweet!! Let me qualify you too!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の後ろから葉留佳さんが抱きつく。
鈴@「うぅ…恥ずかしいから止めろ…」
クド@「私も鈴さんは可愛いと思います～」
小毬@「私もりんちゃん大好きだよ～」
んなして鈴にくっつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud and Komari-san joined in the hug.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud and Komari-san joined in the hug.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ううううぅぅぅ…」
鈴@「いいかげんにしろおまえらーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Just get off of me, all of you!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Just get off of me, all of you!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ほわあっ!!」
クド@「わふーっ!!」
葉留佳@「あはははにげろーっ!!」
んなしてドタバタと部室の中を走り回る。
MESSAGE.EN: The four of them started running around the room in circles.
MESSAGE.Translation: The four of them started running around the room in circles.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…美魚君は参加しないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Mio-kun, are you not going to join them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Mio-kun, are you not going to join them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「キャラじゃないですから」
来ヶ谷@「ふむ？」
美魚@「どれだけ風向きが変わっても、わたしはわたし、ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝No matter which way the wind blows, I'll always stay the way I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝No matter which way the wind blows, I'll always stay the way I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか」
んな話をするふたりと一緒に、騒がしくする４人を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With those two girls, I watched the quartet playing tag.
MESSAGE.Translation: With those two girls, I watched the quartet playing tag.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、鈴はみんな好きってことなんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: When all was said and done, Rin must really like them all.
MESSAGE.Translation: When all was said and done, Rin must really like them all.

MESSAGE.JP: まりは、そういうことなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess that's the way it is.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess that's the way it is.

MESSAGE.JP: んなが一緒だと、楽しい。
今はそれでいいんじゃないかと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For now, I think that's enough for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For now, I think that's enough for us.

MESSAGE.JP: 日して。
謙吾@「めでたく完治だ」
真人@「これでようやくバトル再開か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So now we can finally battle again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So now we can finally battle again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「早速勝負だ、謙吾っ！」
謙吾@「馬鹿か、バトルには足りないものがあるだろう」
真人@「おっと、オレとしたことが大事なもんを忘れてた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oops, I can't believe I forgot something that important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oops, I can't believe I forgot something that important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もう少し我慢しておけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We're gonna have to be patient a bit longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We're gonna have to be patient a bit longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う。その人がいないと遊ぶ楽しさも半減してしまうんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. Without him, we can only have half the fun we could if he were with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. Without him, we can only have half the fun we could if he were with us.

MESSAGE.JP: から、みんな待ち続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, they have all been waiting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, they have all been waiting.

MESSAGE.JP: も待ち続ける。
理樹@「じゃあ、代わりに何をやろう？」
謙吾@「火渡り修行なんてどうだ」
真人@「うわあぁぁーっ！　やめてくれえぇぇーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaahhhh! Don't let me hear that word!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaahhhh! Don't let me hear that word!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、真人がすごい昔のことを思い出して苦しんでる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, he must have remembered what happened to him as a kid...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, he must have remembered what happened to him as a kid...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは初めて出会った日のことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The events of the very first day we met.
MESSAGE.Translation: The events of the very first day we met.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ファイヤーダンスでもいいぞ」
真人@「どぅるあああぁぁぁぁーーっ!!」
謙吾@「あれは楽しかったな。俺とあいつの呼吸がぴったり合っていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That was such a great time. We were in total synchronization.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That was such a great time. We were in total synchronization.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴もね」
鈴@「あれは大笑いだったな」
も楽しかったのは、やっぱりあの人が居たからなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But the biggest reason why it was fun is because he was there with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the biggest reason why it was fun is because he was there with us.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「だがファイヤーダンスは見るのは楽しそうだが、やりたくはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I would love to see someone fire dancing, but I don't want to do it myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I would love to see someone fire dancing, but I don't want to do it myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、そりゃそうか」
小毬@「じゃあ缶ケリはどうですかっ」
理樹@「それもやっちゃったしなぁ…」
れに、前にやったような仕掛けがないと、盛り上がりに欠ける気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Plus, it would be less fun without all those items that we used for the game before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Plus, it would be less fun without all those items that we used for the game before.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「お泊り会っ」
鈴@「まだお昼だぞ」
葉留佳@「キモ試しっ」
理樹@「だからまだお昼だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you hear, it's still day time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you hear, it's still day time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「人形劇はいかがでしょう」
来ヶ谷@「肝心の脚本家がいないな」
謙吾@「趣向を変えて、今度はみんなで剣道というのはどうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why don't we do kendo for a change of pace.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why don't we do kendo for a change of pace.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おめえが強すぎて面白くねえだろうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We wouldn't have any fun because you're too strong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We wouldn't have any fun because you're too strong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「新聞紙ブレードならすぐ用意できますヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can get us newspaper blades quickly enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can get us newspaper blades quickly enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「でもこれはこないだやっちゃいましたしネ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But we did that the other day...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But we did that the other day...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
かなか、新しい遊びが思い浮かばない。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody was having a hard time figuring out how we should entertain ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody was having a hard time figuring out how we should entertain ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん…」
葉留佳@「困ったね…」
れからみんなで、あーでもない、こーでもないとアイディアを出し合う。
MESSAGE.EN: We kept swapping opinions for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kept swapping opinions for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、決まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But still couldn't decide what to play.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But still couldn't decide what to play.

MESSAGE.JP: ったひとりがいないだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just because we didn't have him here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just because we didn't have him here.

MESSAGE.JP: そのひとりの存在はとても大きい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Such was the weight his presence carried.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Such was the weight his presence carried.

MESSAGE.JP: れど。
っと、その人は。
うすぐ、帰ってきて。
MESSAGE.EN: He'll come back any time now.
MESSAGE.Translation: He'll come back any time now.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「みんな、揃ってるな」
の方をみる。
MESSAGE.EN: We all turned toward the windows.
MESSAGE.Translation: We all turned toward the windows.

MESSAGE.JP: その人が。
の向こうに、いた。
理樹@「…きょ、恭介っ!!」
恭介@「ああ」
んな、口々にその名前を呼びながら、その人の下へ。
MESSAGE.EN: His name was on all of our lips as we rushed over to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: His name was on all of our lips as we rushed over to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…」
理樹@「お、おかえり…っ!!」
恭介@「…いいタイミングだろう？」
う言いながら、無邪気に笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: There was an innocent smile on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was an innocent smile on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: の人は、こうやって帰ってきて。
MESSAGE.EN: He came back to us just like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: He came back to us just like this...

MESSAGE.JP: こう言って、みんなを驚かせるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and took all of us by surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and took all of us by surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…けが、平気なのか？」
配そうに鈴が言った。
中治療室に入れられるくらいの大怪我だ。当然、まだ完治もしていないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was obvious that he hadn't fully recovered yet, having been injured so badly that he had to be taken into an intensive care unit.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was obvious that he hadn't fully recovered yet, having been injured so badly that he had to be taken into an intensive care unit.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、見た目にはとてもそうは思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, he wasn't looking anything like one who had just been discharged from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, he wasn't looking anything like one who had just been discharged from there.

MESSAGE.JP: 帰ってきたのは、いつもの恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was no different from the way he always was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was no different from the way he always was.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺なら、大丈夫だ」
恭介@「そうじゃなかったら、こんな真似もできないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Otherwise, I wouldn't be able to do this, now would I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Otherwise, I wouldn't be able to do this, now would I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手でロープを登ってみせる。
MESSAGE.EN: He started climbing the rope with one hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started climbing the rope with one hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ、あぶないからっ」
恭介@「ははっ」
チャクチャなことをする。
介は、いつだってムチャクチャだ。
恭介@「…さて、早速だが」
うして、いつでも…。
MESSAGE.EN: And just like that, he always...
MESSAGE.Translation: And just like that, he always...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺たちで、もう一度…修学旅行に行くぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All of us, once again... let's go on a field trip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All of us, once again... let's go on a field trip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無茶苦茶なミッションを、僕らに出すんだ。
画通り。
らは学校の前に停めてある、恭介が用意したワゴン車に乗り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: We went down to the school gate and climbed into the van he'd rented.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went down to the school gate and climbed into the van he'd rented.

MESSAGE.JP: 的地は、海。
当の修学旅行とは違う場所だけど、みんなも賛成だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although it wasn't the place our previous field trip was supposed to take us, none of us complained about the choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although it wasn't the place our previous field trip was supposed to take us, none of us complained about the choice.

MESSAGE.JP: ゴン車は１０人じゃ、ちょっと狭い。
MESSAGE.EN: The wagon was a little too small for the ten of us to ride comfortably.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wagon was a little too small for the ten of us to ride comfortably.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、そんなの関係ない。
真人@「…大丈夫なのかよ、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Are you sure we can do this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Are you sure we can do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なに、免許はちゃんとあるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No worries, I have my driver's license here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No worries, I have my driver's license here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いつの間に…」
恭介@「俺がおとなしくベッドで寝てるだけだとでも思ったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Did you think I'd merely wait patiently in bed back in the hospital?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Did you think I'd merely wait patiently in bed back in the hospital?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、それで退院が遅れたわけだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, isn't that why your discharge was delayed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, isn't that why your discharge was delayed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「う…まあ、否定しないさ」
小毬@「ここ一緒に回ろうね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's go have a look at this spot～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's go have a look at this spot～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、あたしはここもいきたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sure, I wanna go to this place too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sure, I wanna go to this place too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんだかとてもどきどきなのですっ」
葉留佳@「あはははっ、こんな事やるのも私たちくらいだろうしねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha! It must only be us who are ever going on this kind of trip!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha! It must only be us who are ever going on this kind of trip!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚@「…違う意味でもスリリングですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...This is thrilling in a different sort of way too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...This is thrilling in a different sort of way too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おい、理樹」
理樹@「え？」
鈴@「…ここは、一緒に行こう」
理樹@「うん、そうだね」
う一度、ここから始まる、僕らの物語。
MESSAGE.EN: We were about to start over our story from here again.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were about to start over our story from here again.

MESSAGE.JP: れは『リトルバスターズ』の物語。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the story of the ❛Little Busters.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the story of the ❛Little Busters.❜

MESSAGE.JP: っとまだまだ、続いていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure it's going to be a very long story...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure it's going to be a very long story...

MESSAGE.JP: か彼方まで。
MESSAGE.EN: Lasting until the ever distant future.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lasting until the ever distant future.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあ、おまえら準備はいいか？」
が一様に頷く。
恭介@「よし、それじゃあ、出発だ!!」
